unnormalised: Campus hiring initiatives are crucial for talent acquisition. IIT Delhi and other premier institutions are fertile grounds. This year, we're aiming for candidates specializing in AI/ML, starting at Rs. 8,00,000 per annum. Like in "3 Idiots," identifying raw talent and nurturing it is key. We'll be visiting BITS Pilani next week. Let's build a strong future workforce. Good luck to all participants!
